title: Genetic Modification
description: Schema for submitting an information on genetic modification.

purpose.comment: Modifications for tagging purposes need to include the epitope_tag property in combination with a target. Modifications for other purposes also need either the site and/or target specified.

alternate_accessions.title: Alternate accessions
alternate_accessions.description: Accessions previously assigned to objects that have been merged with this object.
alternate_accessions.comment: Do not submit. Only admins are allowed to set or update this value.

items.title: Alternate Accession
items.description: An accession previously assigned to an object that has been merged with this object.
items.comment: Only accessions of objects that have status equal replaced will work here.

description.title: Description
description.description: A plain text description of the genetic modification.

url.title: URL
url.description: An external resource with additional information about the modification.

target.title: Target
target.description: The name of the gene whose expression or product is modified by the genetic modification.

assembly.title: Mapping assembly
assembly.description: The genome assembly to which modification coordinates relate. e.g. GRCh38.

chromosome.title: Chromosome
chromosome.description: The number (or letter) designation for the target chromosome. e.g. 1, 2L, or X

end.title: End
end.description: The ending coordinate (possibly equal to the starting coordinate for one base.)

epitope_tags.title: Protein epitope tags
epitope_tags.description: Eptiope tags introduced in the modification.

items.title: Protein epitope tag
items.description: Epitope tag introduced in the modification.
items.comment: Submit tag name and tag location. If the fusion protein is designed to be expressed with a non-native promoter, please indicate the promoter used.

promoter_used.title: Promoter used in construct
promoter_used.description: The name of the gene that the promoter regulates natively.

modification_type.title: Modification type
modification_type.description: The type of the genetic modification.

purpose.title: Purpose
purpose.description: The purpose of the genetic modification.

zygosity.title: Modification zygosity
zygosity.description: The zygosity of the genetic modification.

techniques_used.title: Techniques used
techniques_used.description: Genetic modification technique(s)/tool(s) used to perform the modification.

items.title: Technique used
items.description: Techniques and reagents used to produce the described genetic modification.

technique_used.title: Technique used
technique_used.description: Technique used to produce the described genetic modification.

reagent_repository.title: Reagent repository
reagent_repository.description: Repository where reagent used to produce the described genetic modification can be obtained, if applicable.

reagent_identifiers.title: Reagent identifier
reagent_identifiers.description: Repository identifier of the reagent used to produce the describe genetic modification, if applicable.
reagent_identifiers.comment: If a mutagenic chemical is used, please provide the ChEBI ID.

documents.title: Documents
documents.description: Supporting documents describing how the genetic modification(s) was/were produced.
documents.comment: If reagents were not deposited into a repository with relevant details, then please describe the methods in attached documents.

items.title: Document
items.description: Supporting document describing how the genetic modification(s) was/were produced.

modification_technique.title: Modification technique
modification_technique.description: ModificationTechnique used, see modification_technique.json for available identifiers.
modification_technique.comment: Please provide if technique_used = transfection, transduction, RNAi, TALE or CRISPR and reagents were not deposited into a linked repository specified by reagent_repository and reagent_idnetifier.
